alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 6:19PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...Several strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Coconino County south of Winslow through 645 PM MST... At 617 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Starlight Pines, or 30 miles southwest of Winslow, moving southwest at 10 mph impacting portions of Highway 87. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Starlight Pines. This includes State Route 87 between mile markers 305 and 319. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If driving, periods of reduced visibility will create hazardous travel conditions. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County
